metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46659 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
MariaDB before 10.7.2 allows an application crash because it does not recognize that SELECT_LEX::nest_level is local to each VIEW.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-46659` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmariadb3 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
libmariadbd19 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-backup - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-client - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-client-10.5 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-client-core-10.5 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-common - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-plugin-cracklib-password-check - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-plugin-gssapi-client - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-plugin-gssapi-server - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-plugin-rocksdb - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-plugin-s3 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-server - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-server-10.5 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-server-core-10.5 - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-test - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
mariadb-test-data - 1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.5 package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:10.5.15-0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
